a71a1932b894572106460ca2e34a63dc0cb8c1ba.query: UPDATE subscriptions SET status = 'confirmed' WHERE id = $1

aa7e732d453403819a489e1a4ac5c56cd3b57bc8.query: SELECT id FROM subscriptions WHERE email = $1

af39f6179a1701ac97db410e2cfb226a327de606.query: UPDATE subscription_tokens SET is_valid = false WHERE subscriber_id = $1

ba381bfe30c7b5f884e29116021c85af88eb0cd1.query: UPDATE subscriptions SET status = 'pending_confirmation', subscribed_at = $1 WHERE id = $2

d137111c91f264dcea401515bf2913e68c92b774.query:
INSERT INTO subscription_tokens (subscription_token, subscriber_id, is_valid)
        VALUES ($1, $2, true)

e6822c9e162eabc20338cc27d51a8e80578803ec.query:
INSERT INTO subscriptions (id, email, name, subscribed_at, status)
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, 'pending_confirmation')

f5d0fb44281ac3619ace81907ec7de7e62ba107c.query: SELECT subscriber_id, is_valid FROM subscription_tokens WHERE subscription_token = $1 AND is_valid = true
